title: ESIC Rajasthan Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for 13 Senior Resident, Specialist Posts
description: The Employees' State Insurance Corporation, Rajasthan (ESIC Rajasthan) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 13 Senior Resident, Specialist Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ MBBS, PGDM, Post-graduation, and DNB can apply for the ESIC Rajasthan Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have me...
